Name /Title: Verify the user can add text post
Steps to be Executed:
1-Application opened Successfully
2-Create account and Login
3-HomePage Opened successfully
4-click on"What,s on Your mind ?"
5-Go to the field of writing a post
6-click on"Post"button
Test Data: "Hello this my first Post on FaceBook APP"
Expected Results: Text post should be posted successfully and should be visible in the latest news feed
Actual Result: Text post should be posted successfully and should be visible in the latest news feed

1-Application opened Successfully
2-Create account and Login
3-HomePage Opened successfully
4-click on"What,s on Your mind ?"
5-Go to the field of writing a post

7-click on"Post"button
Test Data: "Hello this my first Post on FaceBook APP"+red color

Actual Result: Text post should be posted successfully with red color and should be visible in the latest news feed with red background

Name /Title: Verify the user can add text post and Tag one person
Steps to be Executed:

2-Create account and Login
3-HomePage Opened successfully

6-Go to the Tag field and tag "Menna Hossam"
7-click on"Post"button
Test Data: "Hello this my first Post on FaceBook APP"+ assigned "@Menna Hossam"
Expected Results: Text post should be posted successfully with red color and should be visible in the latest news feed with Tagging "Menna Hossam"
Actual Result: Text post should be posted successfully with red color and should be visible in the latest news feed with Tagging "Menna Hossam"
